definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[נֶחְבָּא]] Ju Jdg 9:5 + 1Sa 10:22, 2Sa 17:9 (both may be pt.); [[נַחְבֵּאתָ]] Ge 31:37; ´[[וְנַחְ]] consec. 1Sa 19:2; [[נֶעחבְּאוּ־]] Jos 10:27; [[נֶחְבָָּאוּ]] Job 29:8, Job 29:10; Impf. 2 ms. [[תֵּחָבֵא]] Job 5:21; Inf. cstr. [[הֵחָבֵא]] 2Ch 18:24, Da 10:7; Pt. pl. (cf. also supr.) [[נֶחְבְּאִים]] Jos 10:17, etc.—hide oneself in fear Ge 3:10 (J), Jos 10:16, Jos 10:17, Jos 10:27 (all JE), Ju Jdg 9:5, 1Sa 19:2, 2Sa 17:9, Am 9:3, 2Ch 18:24, Da 10:7; from modesty 1Sa 10:22; cf. Job 29:8; also [[לָ֫מָּה נַחְבֵּאתָ לִבְרׂתַ]] Ge 31:27 (E), i.e. why didst thou flee secretly? pass., be hidden Job 29:10 [[קול נְגִידִים]] [[נְחְבָָאוּ]] (‖[[ולשׁונם לְחִכָּם דָּבֵָקָה]], cf. also v. 9) i.e. in reverence, = hushed (so we speak of a veiled voice); be hidden for protection [[בִּשׁוֹט לָשׁוֹן]] Job 5:21.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[חֻבְּאוּ]] have been hidden (= are made to hide themselves, Di ad loc.) Job 24:4.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. sf. [[הֶחְבִּיאָָנִי]] Is 49:2; 3 fs. [[הֶחְבְּêַאתָׂה]] Jos 6:17, cf. Ges:§ 75, Rem. 21 a Köi. 624 ff. etc.; Impf. [[וַיַּחְבִּיאֵם]] 1Ki 18:4; 3 fs. [[וַתַּחְבִּא]] 2Ki 6:29; [[וׇאַחְבִּא]] 1Ki 18:13; —hide, trans., c. acc. Jos 6:17, Jos 6:25, 1Ki 18:4, 1Ki 18:13, 2Ki 6:29; metaph., of divine protection Is 49:2 ´[[בְּחֵל יׇדוֹ ה]].

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Pf. be hidden [[הָחְבָָּאוּ]] Is 42:22 ([[בְּבָתֵּי כלאים]]), i.e. imprisoned.
draw together, thicken, harden, of water becoming ice Job 38:30 [[כאבן]] ´[[מים יִתְחַ]].
